name: Back to the Arkanoid
description:
This game was made in 60hours during the "Pot-au-jeu » GameJam

If you encounter any bug or issue (it’s a Gamejam guys so it can happen!), simply press ESCAPE and restart the game!

The game is optimise for a 16/9 screen resolution.

What is "Back to the Arkanoid":

Back to the Arkanoid is a comeback to a time where a simple bar and a ball kept us hooked for hours! Except the hero, Taito, has decided to take over the source code and refresh the gameplay!

Goal is simple, destroy all the bricks but keep a lookout for the traps…

If you fall, you loose life.

If a brick falls, you loose life.

Earn point to get more powerful weapons!

INPUTS:

LEFT & RIGHT MOUSE : move the platform

SPACE ; jump

Q & D : move the character

LEFT SHIFT : shoot

ESCAPE : quit game

P : enable/disable music
